file_content.text: No Bas-Ton. Something on the body, though....
A Voss commando. The kidnapper left him for us.
I don't think Bas-Ton is here, sir. There's something on the body....
The kidnapper left us a present. But not Bas-Ton.
I detect a holorecorder on the body. Your friend is not here.
Hello, agent. If you're hearing this, you must've found my messenger.
I said I wanted to meet you--still do, but privacy is in both our interests.
The Voss commandos deploy scanning posts out here. Decommission them, and I'll send you final instructions.
